SELECT COUNT(*) FROM UpcyReview WHERE PRD_CODE = #{prdCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO UpcyReview (UPCY_CODE, B_CODE, PRD_CODE, UPCY_GRADE, UPCY_CONTENT, UPCY_DATE) VALUES (#{upcyCode}, #{bCode}, #{prdCode}, #{upcyGrade}, #{upcyContent}, #{upcyDate})
